commits: 4a9205e: fix(#235): preserve complete prompt output with rawContent field
message: TDD implementation complete. rawContent field added to PromptDetectionResult with truncation limits (200 lines / 5000 chars). DB save logic updated to prefer rawContent. PromptMessage UI displays instruction text. 14 new tests added, all passing. Coverage: prompt-detector.ts 98.51% statements, 100% lines. Zero static analysis errors.
